verses.roman:
śrī-śuka uvāca
iti tad-vacanaṁ śrutvā
vasudevo mahā-manāḥ
tān ṛṣīn ṛtvijo vavre
mūrdhnānamya prasādya ca

synonyms: śrī-śukaḥ uvāca—Śukadeva Gosvāmī said; iti—thus spoken; tat—their; vacanam—words; śrutvā—having heard; vasudevaḥ—Vasudeva; mahā-manāḥ—generous; tān—them; ṛṣīn—the sages; ṛtvijaḥ—as priests; vavre—chose; mūrdhnā—with his head; ānamya—bowing down; prasādya—gratifying them; ca—also.
translation: Śukadeva Gosvāmī said: After hearing these statements of the sages, generous Vasudeva bowed his head to the ground and, praising them, requested them to become his priests.
